author: martin
msg: Under the assumption that the recent CRLF change makes the
*_strictly kludge no longer necessary, I removed that part
of ebcdic.[ch]. This is untested by me, so please tell me
if it breaks anything for you and I'll revert it.

author: martin
msg: Freshen up the MPE port. MPE/iX now supports dynamic loading of modules.
